name: Kids Race Car Game for Toddlers
name_original: Kids Race Car Game for Toddlers
description:
Everything in the game is absolutely FREE!
Take part in awesome competition! Become the real racer!
Are you ready to become the best racer in the world? Feel the speed, race toward the wind, taste the victory! Beat the rivals, get your cup!

Trace your progress on the map. Race at famous world sights. Travel from one spectacular wonder of the world to another one.

Win cars. Come first in the world championship and become the owner of a cool car.

Overcome obstacles. Be careful on the road - watch out for various obstacles. React fast. Overcome them and don’t let your rival outrace you.

Select fun racers. Meet Kitty, Doggy, Shark and others. These little animal racers can’t wait to help you win this competition.

Collect trophies. The player receives a collectible car after every victory placed on a special prize shelf.

14 vehicles to race, tune up and customize. The set includes a number of vehicles, from motorcycle to cool monster truck.

Features:
- 14 vehicles. The collection includes sport cars, trucks, motorcycles, race car, concept car, big jeep, 4x4 pickup and, of course, police car.
- Fun animal stickers
- 8 different locations
